Name: CategorySchemeName
Description: A name for the CategoryScheme. May be expressed in multiple languages. Repeat the element to express names with different content, for example different names for different systems.

Name: Label
Description: A display label for the CategoryScheme. Supports multiple language versions of the same content as well as optional formatting of the content. Repeat for labels with different content, for example, labels with differing length limitations.

Name: Description
Description: A description of the content and purpose of the CategoryScheme. Supports multiple language versions of the same content as well as optional formatting of the content.

Name: CategorySchemeReference
Description: Allows for inclusion by reference of other category schemes.

Name: CategoryReference
Description: A description of a particular category or response. OECD Glossary of Statistical Terms: Generic term for items at any level within a classification, typically tabulation categories, sections, subsections, divisions, subdivisions, groups, subgroups, classes and subclasses.

Name: CategoryGroupReference
Description: Allows categories to be grouped with or without hierarchical structure.
